channel.title: (pi) rep++
channel.description:
Basically, when you click an object you recieve 2 items - that's the first question and the second one is how do I make it so when you bury the bones a monster spawns?
REP++ for help, kind regards.

item.title: (pi) rep++
item.dc:creator: @owner_nitro owner nitro
item.description:
@owner_nitro wrote:

#1 wuld be in actinhandler.java just search the object ID that you are clicking to recieve the items then delete the case
#2 would be in prayer.java just search the bone id then make it spawn a monster(this is pointless tho cause ur gonna make like 500 monsters spawn for ppl who are trying to get 99 prayer all at once)

Read full topic
